Enchanted Salt

miscellaneous (lvl 4)

item id [id]: 444
weap id [weapon]: 761 (Throw Salt)
resource cost [rcost]: 1
damage [dmg]: 1 Salt Damage
length [len]: 5
nbr of attacks [nratt]: 1
area of effect [aoe]: 1
(cannot-repel [norepel])
 
(Armor Negating [armornegating], Intrinsic Weapon [bonus], Cannot be used for repelling [norepel], Cannot be repelled [unrepel], Magic weapon [magic], Strength not added to damage [nostr])

Requires 5E to forge (E1)

Many ghosts and spiritual beings, and the Jinnun of Ubar in particular, are sensitive to salt. One of the few means to protect oneself from the Unseen is salt. When enchanted, salt will not only cause discomfort, but outright harm Jinnun. Enchanted salt thrown at the Unseen will stun them, harm them, disrupt their glamour and force them to become visible.
